attributes.action: Pay student nurses for working hours
attributes.additional_details: I want this and many others do because we are having to all work up to 7 days a week just to afford to live. If you are a family that earns over a certain amount you are classed to be capable of living off parents wage when really this is irrelevant, at uni you are an adult - support yourself and pay your own bills no matter who you live with. This is making us work up to 80 hours a week , 3 13 hour shifts with the NHS free working and our own jobs just to be able to live.
attributes.background: I would like the government/ parliament to look into student nurses getting paid whilst training and put a stop to us working for free

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

Ensure student nurses are paid whilst they are on clinical placement
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648986
